lines.text: It's not a question of "Did I"? It's "Do I remember"?
How can I love you back, when I don't even love myself?
How do you answer a question that, you know, that...
Have you looked at your life, are you satisfied with what and where you are in your life? What do you want to be different?
Ah, I want to be free... of my past. I want, I want...
Well, what comes to mind, what are your options?
That's the problem, I mean what do I, what do I do? I can't get on with my life until I... solve... my past.
And you say you have these nagging thoughts that you did something terrible. Has anybody ever supported those thoughts? Anyone?
So this is all in your mind...
